Exaggerate: The claim may be considered as exaggerating the extent of pollution in the Ganga river by stating that it is a "hotbed of pollutants."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or data to support the assertion that the Ganga river is unclean.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the image being shared, such as the BJP also using the same image to target Congress.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image was taken before the BJP came into power, suggesting that it is not a result of their governance.
Falters at times: The claim may falter in its argument by relying on a single image to make a broad statement about the cleanliness of the Ganga river.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image accurately represents the current state of the Ganga river without considering other factors or changes that may have occurred since the image was taken.
Understate: There is no evidence of any bias of understating in the provided claim.
